Pei hwa Presbyterian primary school is a very good school ,  they students there show respect and the teachers are very friendly and willing to teach , I was a student there and one of the best teachers are probably Mr Idris chua and Mr John Leung they teach me step by step until I understand ,you can even ask them to repeat a lot of times if you don't understand, the toilets are very clean and  please come to this school ,is indeed a excellent school
